short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Governor of New York Andrew Cuomo offers an inspirational quote for new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace new tab screen with current day, time, and an inspiring quote from Gov. Cuomo on a beautiful background image from the state of New York.
